description:
Welcome to this beginners guide to how to go about correctly registering and configuring a Domain name for your online business. 

This course is mainly aimed at beginners but is actually for people of all experience levels. 

All are welcome to jump in - as I realise that even those that have been using and working with Domain names for several years may not know all the working of domains - or the important SEO factors of a Domain name, so everyone can learn from this.

Not many people know that the good SEO of a website can actually start before you have even designed a single page - and actually begins with the registration of a great Domain Name in the 1st instance. This can be half the battle won, and can pay real dividends when it comes to the SEO of your website.

This course is a real hustlers guide to Domain Names and will teach you:

  • How to choose a great Domain Name for your website / business
  • How to choose a Domain Name based on important modern SEO factors
  • How to go about choosing the right Domain Name registrar to add your domain to the domains database / register (Icann)
  • Other nuggets of information related to Domain Names

I am super confident that you will learn more than you already know about the important aspects of a Domain Name, and as I am sure you will agree, if you learn just one new thing then it will have been worth it. 

You have nothing to lose, so jump in!

We are super proud that this course is covered by the Udemy 30 Day money back guarantee, so you really have absolutely nothing to lose - and knowledge to gain. 

...... see you on the inside!
title: Registering A Domain Name for Business - An e-Hustlers Guide
